job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtThe business environment relies heavily on software for many functions  from automated traffic control systems to complex manufacturing processes and Software Engineers are pivotal in the development of software that provides real solutions A Software Engineer needs to address the entire software development lifecycle  to analyse the needs and then design test and develop software in order to meet those needsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtVisa type Open visaltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtImproving system quality by identifying issues and common patterns and developing standard operating proceduresltligtltligtEnhancing applications by identifying opportunities for improvement making recommendations and designing and implementing systemsltligtltligtMaintaining and improving existing codebases and peer review code changesltligtltligtLiaising with colleagues to implement technical designsltligtltligtInvestigating and using new technologies where relevantltligtltligtProviding written knowledge transfer materialltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligtA passion forampnbspsolving problemsampnbspand providing workable solutionsltligtltligtKnowledge of algorithms and data structuresltligtltligtStrong analytical and reasoning skills with an ability to visualise processes and outcomesltligtltligtProficiency in troubleshooting software issues and debugging a large codebaseltligtltligtOutstanding allroundampnbspcommunication skillsampnbspand ability to workampnbspcollaborativelyltligtltulgt
